name: You Can (Not) Pet the Cat!
description:
You are the Watcher. When all options have been exhausted, when no one else can answer the call, you are summoned.

You must pet sit.

You are allergic to cats.

You are Mx. Cuddles, the best and greatest of your kind. Many travel from afar just for the chance to touch your plush, silky belly.

Your most loyal follower has gone missing, and in their place is a usurper who refuses to show proper deference to a creature of your sublime grace.

You must show this interloper who rules this home.

You Can (Not) Pet the Cat! is a 2-player, GM-less RPG. One player is the Watcher who must pet sit until their friend returns. The other player is Mx. Cuddles, who demands pets. Will you resist giving the kitty the Good Scritches or are they too cute to deny?
